CmdLine: apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://pgp.mit.edu:80 --recv-keys 573BFD6B3D8FBC641079A6ABABF5BD827BD9BF62 	&& echo "deb http://nginx.org/packages/mainline/debian/ jessie nginx" >> /etc/apt/sources.list 	&& cd /tmp 	&& apt-get install wget -y 	&& wget http://nginx.org/keys/nginx_signing.key 	&& apt-key add nginx_signing.key 	&& apt-get update 	&& apt-get autoremove 	&& apt-get install --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests -y 						ca-certificates 						nginx 						nginx-module-xslt 						nginx-module-geoip 						nginx-module-image-filter 						nginx-module-perl 						nginx-module-njs 						gettext-base 	&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
